is.merkor.core.database.data
Class HierarchClusterCBC

java.lang.Object
  is.merkor.core.database.data.AbstractPersistentObject
      is.merkor.core.database.data.HierarchClusterCBC
All Implemented Interfaces:
PersistentObject, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
HierarchClusterCBCStub
public class HierarchClusterCBC
extends AbstractPersistentObject
implements java.io.Serializable

HierarchClusterCBC represents a hierarchy of ClusterCBCs, having similar domains. It maps to the table HERARCHCLUSTERS in the MerkOr database. A HierarchClusterCBC is a part of a binary tree and can have one or two leaf clusters or/and one or two hierarchical subclusters. If a hierarchClusterCBC is not the top node of a hierarchy, it has one top cluster of type HierarchClusterCBC.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Anna B. Nikulasdottir
See Also:

getClusterId1

public ClusterCBC getClusterId1()
Gets the 'left' leaf of this hierarchCluster if present. If this hierarchCluster does not have a left leaf, null is returned. Before calling this method therefore a test for existence with hasCluster1() is recommended.

Returns:
the left leaf of this hierarchCluster, or null if it does not exist
